artist: Juan Manuel Sanchez; Times Change Press, New York
creditline: Gift of Michael and Rosalyn Baker
description: red, white and blue design; head of Rockefeller at top flanked by eight stars; list of crimes in red at bottom

title: Buscado / Wanted:  Mr. N. Rockefeller alias 'Kerosene'
